---
title: "List of all handouts"
author: "Steve Simon"
output: html_document
---

Created: 2020-03-19

Last modified: `r Sys.Date()`

```{r read, echo=FALSE}
discussion_files <- list.files(pattern="^handouts")
compiled_text <- NULL
for (i_file in discussion_files) {
  compiled_text <- 
    append(
      compiled_text, 
      c("", paste("##", i_file), "", readLines(i_file)))
}
```

`r length(compiled_text)`

`r paste0(compiled_text, collapse="\n")`
